title: 185: Activating Brain Plasticity with Tom Bilyeu
description:
What is the only belief that matters? 

Today we are in for a special treat as we welcome Tom Bilyeu to the show. Tom is a serial entrepreneur, thought leader, and co-founder of the empowerment media studio, Impact Theory. I am particularly excited because I have had the honor of being a guest on his show and today we get to reverse the rolls a bit. 

In this episode, Tom shares his perspective about the only belief that matters and the ability to accomplish anything you set your mind to without limitation. It’s the shift in his thinking that allowed Tom to become the powerhouse he is today. If you could use some mindset motivation, this episode is for you. 

*** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. ***
